text: Ridgely Johnson (born April 24, 1958) is an American rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the United States Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: Ridgely Johnson
